definition: to drag/to tow/to trail/to hang down/to mop (the floor)/to delay/to drag on
to suspend/to hang up/to hang a person
car/vehicle/CL:輛|辆[liang4]/machine/to shape with a lathe/Kangxi radical 159

sentences.english: Actually, things got a little weirder when the tow truck driver showed up.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，在拖吊車司機出現後，事情的發展更加怪異。
